thread.title: Pentagon Plans New Approach on Syria Rebel Training
thread.title_full: Pentagon Plans New Approach on Syria Rebel Training - WSJ

author: Gordon Lubold
title: Pentagon Plans New Approach on Syria Rebel Training
text:
LONDON—U.S. Defense Secretary Ash Carter said the Pentagon is looking for ways to improve a program to train and equip moderate rebels in Syria after concluding that the current program was not effective, producing only a small handful of trained rebels to fight Islamic State.
“We have been looking at ways to improve that program,” Mr. Carter told reporters at a news conference in London with his U.K. counterpart, Michael Fallon. “I... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
